body:
Hey there, 



I have a few questions regarding the infiltration setting in the Honeybee Set Zone Loads component.





Can anyone tell me how the infiltration is specified in the component, is it m3/s per m2 floor area at 50Pa or at ambient pressure?



and if it is at ambient pressure, does anyone have the equation(s) for how to convert it to 3/s-m2 at 50Pa?

replies.body:
Nickolaj,

Check [this discussion](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/infiltration-values?page=1&commentId=2985220%3AComment%3A1461621&x=1#2985220Comment1461621).

On my last response you can find an example for the 50PA you are asking for. "Normally" the calculation is for ambient pressure.

-A.

Hey Abraham, 



Thank you so much, it worked like a charm :)



- Nickolaj
